TopicTitle: What Should I Do Next In KSP RSS?

Articles.Content:
I'm bored, and I know that I want to doing something in KSP RSS but I don't know what exactly.

Though, I have decided on some ideas, but I don't know which one to do...

Idea 1. Make a LEO space station. (Perhaps Mir-2?)

Idea 2. Make an unmanned Mars rover or lander.

Idea 3. Do a manned Lunar Landing.

Idea 4. Make a spaceplane (Like a manned Skylon or something)

Idea 5. Go to Jupiter and do something.

Idea 6. Make a bunch of Launch Vehicles.

Idea 7. Make something from 2001: A Space Odyssey.

Idea 8. Make the KSP Community CubeSat Phobos Lander.

I can't think of any more ideas.

The minimum number of people for a colony with a healthy gene pool is 200. Sooooo.... build a duna colony for 200 kerbals where each kerbal gets their own hitchhiker. that should keep you busy for a while.
Use only hypergolics to get to Saturn! Manned!

Well, I want something that doesn't take a long time to do because it's uber hard, and It's already frustrating enough when I forget to put communications on my normal KSP probes, let along the stress that I would have when I eventually notice I don't have enough fuel after 20 hours of making that interplanetary ship. (Side note, but I think the Alexandria is a good name for an interplanetary ship) And the Moon colony? I haven't even landed a man on the Moon in KSP RSS and you want me to do like 200 launches for the Moon!?!?!?

Well, I want something that doesn't take a long time to do because it's uber hard, and It's already frustrating enough when I forget to put communications on my normal KSP probes, let along the stress that I would have when I eventually notice I don't have enough fuel after 20 hours of making that interplanetary ship. (Side note, but I think the Alexandria is a good name for an interplanetary ship) And the Moon colony? I haven't even landed a man on the Moon in KSP RSS and you want me to do like 200 launches for the Moon!?!?!?

I think you found your answer.
Go to the furthest planet, whatever it may be.

Motokid600, yeah, I'm actually trying that right now.

EDIT: I'm going to finish it up tomorrow (Or maybe later today), but here is an Imgur thing of taking the LEM unmanned to LLO:

Are the terrain textures in RSS really that blurry? Or are there ways to improve that?
I don't know, I don't have it on max settings.
Oh, okay that's what I was wondering. I REALLY.. have to try RSS... Im just waiting for my current play through to, well... expire I guess I should say. Every day brings a new reason to try it...

Hmm.. okay. Also, here's the launch of the Origin-1's Lunar Stage! (The manned Origin-1 spacecraft will dock to it in LEO, and the LS (Lunar Stage) will do the TLI).

Actially, I also did the launch of Origin-1 spacecraft, docking with the LS, TLI, rendezvous with the LEM, and Lunar Landing!!! (Didn't return home yet, and it'll be hard, the LEM now has only 2 ignitions!)
